entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
